$  callback,
$  message,
&$  log 
)

Stores error information and logs the error.

Parameters:
const $level One of the classes local constants defining error severity
string $callback Name of the function creating the error
string $message Message describing the error
object &$log Valid MAIN_Logger instance

const MAIN_Error::WARNING = 512

Signal for critical errors, creating unwanted results, though not necessarily requiring the script to be terminated.
